title: Erin Holland says she's just started planning her 2020 wedding
text:
She announced her engagement to boyfriend-of-four-years Ben Cutting in May.

And speaking to The Daily Telegraph on Thursday, Erin Holland said that the couple have only just begun planning their wedding.

'We've done a few little bits and pieces,' the 30-year-old former Miss World Australia revealed.

'It's been a process': Cricket WAG Erin Holland, 30, revealed to The Daily Telegraph on Thursday, that she and fiancé Ben Cutting, 32, have only just begun planning their wedding

'I'm not the kind of girl who grew up imagining what my wedding would be like... so it's been a process and I've got some amazing people helping me,' she added.

Erin lives in Sydney while Ben is based in Brisbane, but spends around seven months of the year overseas playing cricket.

The model told Daily Mail Australia on Wednesday, that the couple will continue to live apart even after they get married next year.

Not in any rush: 'I'm not the kind of girl who grew up imagining what my wedding would be like... so it's been a process and I've got some amazing people helping me,' she explained

'Things will probably continue as they are,' she said of their living arrangement.

'I really don't see there being any real rush to live under the same roof.'

Erin continued: 'We're both in time-sensitive careers doing what we're doing, and considering he's gone so much overseas, it certainly isn't worth uprooting everything that I'm doing at the moment, knowing that he's physically gone a lot of the time anyway.'

'Nothing will really change. I'll just continue to live in Sydney and Brisbane.'

Long-distance: Erin announced her engagement to boyfriend-of-four-years Ben in May. The sportsman lives in Brisbane for the majority of the time, while Erin is based in Sydney

Acknowledging their long-distance relationship can be 'difficult' at times, Erin said it makes sense that they live apart.

'We've always been of the opinion that we're in very highly sensitive industries,' she explained.

'You've just got to work hard and make the most of it while the opportunities are there, and we'll have plenty of time to go crazy later on in life.'
description: She announced her engagement to boyfriend-of-four-years Ben Cutting in May.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
